title: 3 and Out - Shorting Kyler, Lamar’s $$$, Jimmy G → Browns (?), Cowboys/Eagles  NFC East
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Shorting Kyler, Lamar’s $$$, Jimmy G → Browns (?), Cowboys/Eagles  NFC East
description:
John explains why he’s shorting Kyler Murray and the Cardinals stock, why it’s time for Lamar Jackson to play hardball and holdout until he get his extension, if Jimmy G to the Browns is a realistic possibility, if the Bucs could be an unexpected disappointment, and if the Cowboys or Eagles should be favored in the NFC East. #herd

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action!
